# Request for Proposal: Chiller Equipment Maintenance Contract
## Publication Information
- **Publication Date**: February 23, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 27, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Bidder Contact Information**: Douglas, Lisel (SPAC/PSPC)
  *Email: [lisel.douglas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisel.douglas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)*
## Contract Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide maintenance services for centrifugal chiller equipment at 3545 Leitrim Road, Ottawa, Ontario. The successful contractor will be responsible for ensuring the proper functioning and performance of the chiller systems in accordance with the Statement of Work.
## Security Requirements
Security requirements are applicable for this tender. Bidders are expected to comply with all related regulations and guidelines.
## Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for March 6, 2024, at 10:00 AM EST. Bidders are required to communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than February 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EST to confirm their attendance and provide the names and dates of birth of the individuals who will attend. Electronic devices, such as cellular phones, are prohibited on site.
## Submission Requirements
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by March 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT. Late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
